pages.text: While the name §7Blessbane§r encompasses the entire space through the portal, §7Blessbane§r really is the initial village area, from the $(l:blessbane/blessbane_2023)first ever Blessbane event$(). This space was created by the §7§kServer§r after $(l:blessbane/researcher)The Researcher$() broke in, in an attempt to find the truth behind the death of The Heart of Hexhaven.

pages.title: The Village
pages.text: $(o)A sickly feeling washes over you... what even is this place?$()
